content:
Kordo stops and looks sternly at you. “I can tell something is on your mind. Can you keep helping me? Or should I head back to Lone Tree, and we try this another time?”

Rangers Choose

A) Continue helping Kordo. Discard all  , and keep HELPING HAND attached to Kordo, Ranger Veteran.

B) Send him back to Lone Tree. Discard Kordo, Ranger Veteran and return HELPING HAND to your collection. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
